Farfetch'd-Galarian.by: after landing 3 critical hits in a single battle
Farfetch'd-Galarian.desc: Land 3 critical hits in a single battle

multiple.special_req: with at least two hearts of affection

Qwilfish-Hisuian.move: Barb Barrage in the strong style 20 times

Nincada.desc: Evolve Nincada with an empty team slot and at least one Poké Ball

multiple.special_req: with the Beauty stat maxed out

Basculin-White-Striped.by: after losing at least 294 HP to recoil damage without fainting
Basculin-White-Striped.desc: Lose at least 294 HP to recoil damage without fainting

Yamask-Galarian.desc: Walk under the large rock arch in the Dusty Bowl after taking at least 49 HP damage from attacks without fainting

Bisharp.special_req: after defeating three Bisharp that hold a Leader's Crest

Pancham.special_req: with a Dark-type Pokémon in the party

Inkay.special_req: with the game system held upside down

Sliggoo.special_req: with rain or fog in the overworld

Sliggoo-Hisuian.special_req: with rain or fog in the overworld

Rockruff.special_req: if it has the ability Own Tempo

Milcery.special_req: when its Trainer spins and strikes a pose

Finizen.special_req: while in a Union Circle group
